name: Playable Character: Deborah Fire
detailed_description:
Deborah Fire is the first DLC playable character to be added to Prison Ball: Full Blown. She requires the base version of Prison Ball: Full Blown and cannot be ran independently.

Deborah Fire brings a whole new dimension to the game of Prison Ball with her paddle caught ablaze! Whenever you reflect a ball with her fiery paddle, that ball will catch fire! Fire balls can ignite nearby bricks with every brick broken, and bricks caught on fire can burn up over time to give Deborah extra points! All those burning bricks.. all those extra points!

The temptation to play as the red haired beauty Deborah Fire has high rewards but also high risks! While Deborah waits for the bricks to burn up for easy points, they can still be broken by her opponent! If an opponents colored ball hits one of her burning bricks, the result is a massive explosion and all bricks in the near-by area will be destroyed and all add to her opponent's score total!

Deborah Fire is certain to set scores and fun levels on fire in Prison Ball: Full Blown! ..Can you stand the heat?

short_description: Deborah Fire brings the element of Fire to Prison Ball: Full Blown! She is a sassy gambler who loves high risk and high rewards! Any balls caught on fire by her flaming paddle can ignite bricks that slowly burn but at the risk of her opponent scoring explosion points if they impact her burning bricks first!
